sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Team = () => { const [teamMembers] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Sarah Johnson', email: 'sarah@hayguard.com', role: 'Farm Manager', status: 'active', lastActive: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 2, name: 'Mike Chen', email: 'mike@hayguard.com', role: 'Sensor Technician', status: 'active', lastActive: '5 hours ago' }, { id: 3, name: 'Alex Rivera', email: 'alex@hayguard.com', role: 'Analytics Specialist', status: 'offline', lastActive: '1 day ago' } ]); const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false); return (

Team Management

Manage your farm monitoring team

{showAddForm && (

Add New Team Member

)}

Team Members ({teamMembers.length})

{teamMembers.map(member => (
{member.name}
{member.email}
{member.role}
{member.status}
Last active: {member.lastActive}
))}
); }; export default Team;
